channel.title: [317] [Delta] Project Rainbow [700+ Customs]
channel.description:
[i]Note: We actually have players. A fairly decent amount for such an overpacked cache on a server aimed primarily at younger children.[/i]
[u]*Will add pictures soon, current links are being censored.[/u]
The last standing Delta server with 700+ customs with more than 30 players?
[url=http://projectrainbow.net/smf]Forums[/url] [url=http://up.ht/rN7WAR]Download Here[/url] [url=http://projectrainbow.net/webby.php]Webclient[/url]
Server Info: Average Player Count: [b]20-50[/b] Type: [b]Delta 317[/b] Accomplishments: [b]Top Delta on RL (#50), #13 on Mopar, Top Customs Server[/b]
Are we one of the only few Delta 317 servers left? Yes, we are.
Hmm.. So what is Project Rainbow?
We are the greatest 317 revision server with customs items! Something that would defy every single other server, and revolutionize the private server world. We are proud and fortunate to announce that we have the most, the best, and the coolest customs! Come and join the community of legends, we are here for you!
In June of 2011, the owners have decided to spice up Rainbow. Since most of the servers up there are all obsessed with player killing, we have upgraded our stats and added some PKing for those elite pkers. We have fully functional pk systems, pk shops, pvp drops (random, yes!) and anything else.Since August, you can now build your own houses! :D
First server with [b]CHEMISTRY[/b] baby! Bind compounds to poison opponents!
We will never reset all of our player accounts, so this is a worthwhile server to play.
If you like PKing but hate customs, it’s easy to adapt! :)
Arcanian Weapons/Photon/Rainbow Claws/Halogen Blades/Oblivion Bow/Guns VS Regular and BORING Runescape items (Which most servers have unfortunately)
Boring, boring, boring! We want something more creative!
The thing that differentiates this server is that we will NEVER reset all players. This server is the most worthwhile to play.
Anyways, Why play Project Rainbow?
We've got:
Awesome Staff Dedicated Windows 2008 24/7 Server - 4GB Ram
300mbps download / 300mbps upload = No Lag
100% Working Combat 100% Multi PKing 100% Fight Caves 100% Pest Control 100% Working Prayer 100% Working PVP Drops 100% Fixed Dupes (we have not received any dupe reports since April)
Pyramid of Zen A fun PVP minigame programmed by Whac and Im Hunter
[b]Skeletons[/b] Get points by killing a variety of skeletons!
Castle Wars Coming soon, please be patient!
Corp, General Graador, Jungle Demon, Demons for claws! Custom minigames! & more.
All Skills Work! Dragon Claws Work! New Training Areas! Skilling is MUCH Easier! Perfect AFK System! We don’t null EVER
Scared to PK? After you get good items from our:
[b]Awesome 700+ Customs,[/b]
you can PK without having to waste time banking and getting new items! You won’t lose items at all!
Good luck! We hope you give it a try!
A few of our specials: [b] Masamune Dual Axe DragonLord Armor Ancient Blade Marshall Armor Liquid Hally Custom Bandos Armor Anarchy Wings Wings of Life Sara Wings Slayer Wings Angel Cape Master Robes Gold Cape Arcanian Weapons Lava Armor Primal Armor Promithium Supreme Claws 20+ Custom Bandos Plates SavageSword Deathknight’s Blade Ak-47 Rainbow Claws Fallen Angel Heavens Fury Awesome Armor Glided D’Hide Popsicle, Colored Phats, H’ween masks, Alot of customized GS’, Like Louise’s Gs, Whac’s Gs, etc. Dragon Gold Combat Skillcape Working Magic Carpet Dual Sabres CHAOTIC WEAPONS Crayon Sword Deathpony Kite Ninja Armor Monkey Bag Elite Black Armor Samurai Armor Katanas Stunners :D Uber Sword Royal Robes Bronze Armor (g) Infinity Robes (t) Birdy Suit Paper Bag Obsidian Armor (Dark Dragon) Multicolored Wings Dark Weapons Holy Weapons Berserk Armor Sailor Suit PK Cape Angry Dog Shield Phoenix GS God Whips Drag Kites (t) Royal Cape Angel Halos Pacman Sword Scythe of Eleanor Evil Weapons Vortex Blade Death Assassin Multicolored Sabres Liquid Spear Dual Ice Swords Golden Weapons Silver Broadsword Dark Ice Weapons Christmas Weapons Custom GS’s (again) Staff Armors Cars Nude Statue Sun Blade Moon Blade Crimson Blade Keyblade PHOTON WEAPONS (they rrrock!) Rainbow Capes Plasma Rifle Rocket Launcher Quest Armor Dragon Armor (blk) Country Capes Halogen Blades Bain Blades CaoNiMa SSBB Hammer SSBB Golden Hammer Rainbow Scarf Pitchfork
Just about every custom you can think of! Want a custom? Ask a modeler on our forums and we will create it for you![/b]
Ingame, there are around quadruple the amount of customs listed above.
Recolors don't count.
[b][u]Media:[/u][/b] [img]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/637_1020.png[/img] 100% construction! [img]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/637_1017.png[/img] Our players love us, why don't you come join in? [img]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/637_1019.png[/img] We have a very stable playerbase, come be a part of it! [img]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/637_1018.png[/img] An example of our amazing Rainbow Claws! [b][u]Our client is coded differently:[/u][/b]
We have a noclip button, feel free to explore wherever you want! We have a fully functional screenshot button. You have an option to set your username and password. You have an option to autologin.
(without you being there!) You can set your custom chat FX!
If you have played these servers: MikeScape FreeRoam CheatSkape Project Catastrophe Ritzscape
then you will definitely love Rainbow! (doesn’t mean that if you hate the above servers then you won’t like this, come on, just try! :P)
Join today, and don’t forget, have fun. ;)
If you are thinking about joining, we strongly encourage you to join first.
We guarantee that you will love this server if you love custom items.
Goodluck, men and women of the new RSPS era. We salute you!
Pretty much copied right off our server status page.
Now... let the hating/praising begin!

item.title: [317] [Delta] Project Rainbow [700+ Customs]

bamp.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] [Delta] Project Rainbow [700+ Customs]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:9, topic:445201”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=547884.msg4018221#msg4018221 date=1339804734]

317 Client Loading 700+ customs.

Holy shit, I smell client lag.

Surprisingly it isn’t laggy, usually there’s 40ish online and no lagg.

Well, it all depends on the machine and I said client, not server. Learn the difference.

I was only saying that it wasn’t laggy. I don’t need to “learn the difference” I was only giving you an insight into what our stability was like seeing as you brought up lagg.
[/quote]
lilxcj what are you on about?
he just responded your comment by saying it wasnt laggy. :|[/quote]

I already said to Lin I would leave this alone but I digress and feel that I need to further my responses to make it clearer.

I said client lag, therefore being particularly strainful on the computer (your users) because of the possibly large load times. That + various bugs can occur (as they always appear) which feature client crashes could affect gameplay.
Large load times -> bugs -> client crashes -> time spent simply loading over and over again (estimated a fair 6 hours apart but still, annoying).

I implied that it wasn’t server lag because you said “40 people online” without a problem, which gives me insight that you’re running it off a decent server and can handle the connections, packet swapping, etc.

There are two different kinds of lag (well, main types).

Regardless, onto the topic and the server. It seems well managed, however, the overuse of customs turns me away from the content because it turns me away from the overall appeal.

Read full topic

The last standing Delta server with 700+ customs with more than 30 players?

Server Info:

Type: Delta 317
Accomplishments: Top Delta on RL (#50), #13 on Mopar, Top Customs Server

Are we one of the only few Delta 317 servers left?
Yes, we are.

Hmm… So what is Project Rainbow?

We are the greatest 317 revision server with customs items! Something that would defy every single other server, and revolutionize the private server world. We are proud and fortunate to announce that we have the most, the best, and the coolest customs! Come and join the community of legends, we are here for you!

In June of 2011, the owners have decided to spice up Rainbow.
Since most of the servers up there are all obsessed with player killing, we have
upgraded our stats and added some PKing for those elite pkers. We have fully functional pk systems, pk shops, pvp drops (random, yes!) and anything else.Since August, you can now build your own houses!

First server with CHEMISTRY baby! Bind compounds to poison opponents!

We will never reset all of our player accounts, so this is a worthwhile server to play.

If you like PKing but hate customs, it’s easy to adapt!

Arcanian Weapons/Photon/Rainbow Claws/Halogen Blades/Oblivion Bow/Guns
VS
Regular and BORING Runescape items (Which most servers have unfortunately)

Boring, boring, boring! We want something more creative!

The thing that differentiates this server is that we will NEVER reset all players. This server is the most worthwhile to play.

Anyways,
